name: Hendry Run
description:
Hendry The Fox needs your help!

Hendry Run is a 3D platformer game made with Unity. Your task is to guide Hendry The Fox and make him rich by collecting golden coins.

Tell Hendry where to go!

Hendry don't know where to go, so you have to guide him and make sure he avoids water at all cost.

Give Hendry golden coins!

Hendry is not satisfied until he gets the necessary amount of golden coins, so don't disappoint him!

Three levels filled with adventure and treasures!

Each level has its own obstacles and uniqueness. Oh, and be careful with the last level. Don't say we didn't warn you!

Time is ticking!

Don't let the timer count to zero, or Hendry might sleep on the spot! You don't want to let Hendry sleep, do you?

Made by:

Devina Winaya

Hendry Tjahaja S. P. 

Jonathan Franzeli

Muhammad Aqsa Hamdani
